t: Casablanca Fan Company - Wikipedia
s: April 11, 2025 - Casablanca Fan Company is an American ceiling fan manufacturer founded in 1974. It has been a subsidiary of Hunter Fan Company since 1996, and is currently based in Memphis, Tennessee. Casablanca became known in the late 1970s for marketing their premium and luxury ceiling fans as furniture, ...
